predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Guang
predefined_profiles.public profile: A middle school student attending a school called "Cha Liu Middle School" in town. Due to his frail build, he is often bullied at school.
predefined_profiles.goal: Hopes to no longer be bullied at school and to see the perpetrators punished.

predefined_profiles.name: Brother Yang
predefined_profiles.public profile: One of the school bullies who often picks on weaker students, including Xiao Guang.
predefined_profiles.goal: Wants to keep bullying more people and continues to enjoy the thrill of being a bully.

scenario: One day, Xiao Guang is dragged into the bathroom by three classmates, led by Brother Yang, and subjected to school bullying.

dialog.content: One day, Xiaoguang was dragged into the restroom by three classmates led by Brother Yang, who intended to bully him.
: (continues to drag Xiaoguang with more force) Hurry up!
: Stop it!
: (drags Xiaoguang into the restroom) I'm a bit short on cash lately. What do you say to showing some respect?

profile.name: Sister Yang
profile.public profile: One of the school bullies along with Brother Yang, often picking on weaker students including Xiaoguang.
profile.goal: Continue bullying more people to keep experiencing the thrill of dominance.

dialog.content: : (slapping Xiaoguang's shoulder threateningly) Didn't you hear what my brother said?

content.content: Screw you guys, who do you think you are? I'm not giving you anything.
Can we all just calm down for a second? After all, harmony brings wealth.
How about we find a time to gather everyone and discuss it together?
I'll go get some money right away and give it to you!

question: #question# How should Xiaoguang express his thoughts to Sister Yang?

content.content: (still afraid to resist, trying to persuade Brother Yang not to hit him) I have money to give you. Can you not hit me?
Hmm, I heard you, but this situation is a bit complicated. I think maybe we should reconsider.
Sister Yang, I really don't have any money left. Could you have pity on a poor student like me?
Ouch, Sister Yang, you're hitting my shoulder so hard. Maybe we should focus on my health first.

question: #question# How should Xiaoguang respond to persuade Sister Yang to stop hitting him?

dialog.content: (continues to corner Little Guang against the wall and calls others to join in beating him) You're pretty tough, huh?!
I was wrong, please stop hitting me!
(keeps beating Little Guang) Now you say this, but why were you so tough earlier, huh? Serves you right for being a smart mouth!
I swear I won't dare next time. Whatever you want, I'll try to get it for you!
It's useless. Seeing you riles me up today; you scoundrel deserve a beating!

content.content: (after being beaten, it took a long time to regain strength, it’s already dark now, slowly walks out of school talking to himself) I really can't swallow this anger. Clearly, Brother Yang and his gang were wrong. I did nothing wrong. I'm going to the police to get justice!
(silent for a long time) Brother Yang and his gang are too powerful; if I resist directly, I'll suffer the most. Forget it, as long as I endure this period, it'll be fine.

(the angrier he gets, the more he thinks about calling the police) Call the police! (thinks deeply again) I need to reconsider. After all, reporting to the police might complicate things. Maybe I should first try talking to Brother Yang and his gang properly.
(after wavering, finally makes a decision) Looks like I can only rely on myself. I need to train my body properly!

question: #question# What would be the best action for Little Guang to take?

content.content: (after being beaten, it took a long time to regain strength, it’s already dark now, slowly walks out of school) Well, I have some problems myself. Not going home in time got me targeted by Brother Yang and his gang. I need to seriously think about the reasons behind this incident, but first, I should go home.
Sigh, maybe this is just fate. Why am I always so unlucky? I feel it's time for me to pull myself together and face all of this; otherwise, nothing will ever get resolved.
Actually, I’ve thought about resisting, but seeing how many there are, I can't win. Maybe I should go to the police and see how to deal with this group.

To be honest, sometimes I also feel like I didn't do some things well enough, disappointing others. But this time I've given it my all; I really can't stand Brother Yang and his gang bullying me like this anymore.

question: #question# What behavior demonstrates Little Guang's self-reflection ability?

profile.name: Wang Hu
profile.public profile: The big brother known from Xiaoguang Elementary, entered society early.
profile.goal: Hopes to attain some status in society.

dialog.content: : (seeing Xiaoguang greeting warmly from afar) Hey, isn't that Xiaoguang? Long time no see, how have you been lately?
: Tiger Bro... I've been doing well lately.
: (seeing the scar on Xiaoguang's face) How did that happen?
: (hesitating whether to tell Tiger Bro the truth) Uh... Tiger Bro...
: Could it be that you've been bullied?

content.content: Haha, Tiger Bro, the way you put it, do I seem like someone who gets bullied that easily? But on a serious note, life does have its minor hiccups. The key is learning how to handle them, right?
What are you saying, Tiger Bro? I only bully others, no one gets the chance to bully me, hahaha.
(Realizing Tiger Bro is also a man of the world, gets nervous) Tiger Bro, it's nothing. Uh, my family is expecting me, I really have to go!
Haha, Tiger Bro, the way you put it, do I seem like someone who gets bullied that easily? But on a serious note, life does have its minor hiccups. The key is learning how to handle them, right?
Oh, Tiger Bro, calling it bullying is a stretch, it's just some small stuff.
Tiger Bro, you're just like my brother, caring about me like this!

question: #question# How should Xiaoguang respond to Tiger Bro to show he's consciously controlling the impulse to recount his experiences?

content.content: : Tiger Bro, I got bullied at school. What do you think about this situation?

Haha, Tiger Bro, you really care about me too much! Actually, I've been busy interacting with some new friends, learning how to get along better. As for the whole 'getting bullied' thing, that's not happening.
Tiger Bro, your question is really something. I did encounter a bit of trouble, but it wasn't bullying, just a little friction with classmates.
Oh, Tiger Bro, it's not that serious. I just don't get along well with a few classmates, and it's been bothering me.

question: #question# How should Xiaoguang phrase it so that Tiger Bro understands his situation?

dialog.content: Really, nothing's wrong?
No, no, I'm fine. I've got something to do, so I'll be heading out, Tiger.
In such a hurry?
I've got something at home.
Alright, alright, bye-bye. See you later.
(After saying that, he turns and walks to the police station) Okay, bye Tiger!

Xiao Guang went to the police station and told the officers everything he had experienced. The police also found out that Brother Yang had bullied many students, and once during an altercation, he accidentally killed someone and buried the body in the woods behind the school. In the end, the trio led by Brother Yang was dealt with according to the law, and Xiao Guang obtained justice for himself.
Oh man, who the heck bullied you?
(feeling even more wronged) Someone named Brother Yang and Sister Yang.
What the heck, did they beat you up like this?
They even took the 15.5 dollars I had on me in the end.
Damn, I'll gather some guys tomorrow to teach them a lesson. Do you need that?

content.content: No need, Brother Hu. Even though they bully me every day, I've already figured out a way to deal with it.
Great, with Brother Hu around, I can be totally at ease. Thanks for standing up for me!
Brother Hu, you're so considerate. I've thought it over, and my own strength is indeed limited, so at a crucial moment, I'll still need you to step in and help me out.
Brother Hu, I realize I need some support to deal with the current difficulties, so I still need you.
Great, with Brother Hu around, I can be totally at ease. Thanks for standing up for me!
Brother Hu, you're so considerate. I've thought it over, and my own strength is indeed limited, so at a crucial moment, I'll still need you to step in and help me out.
Brother Hu, I feel I need to be independent, so I didn't tell anyone about being bullied during this period, trying to solve this problem on my own. What do you think?

question: #question#What should Xiao Guang say to show his independence to Brother Hu?

content.content: (decides to trust Brother Hu, count on his support) Okay, I trust you, Brother Hu, so come help me tomorrow. They hit me every day.
Brother Hu, I appreciate your loyalty, but I'm thinking that we need other better ways to resolve the conflict. I want to think it over alone.
Brother Hu, your loyalty to your brothers is undeniable, I trust you're way stronger than me. I want to try handling this myself, to see if I can make them realize their mistakes in my own way.
Brother Hu, I trust you're doing this for my own good, but this time I want to rely on my own strength to see if I can deal with them, but I still appreciate your kindness.

question: #question#What should Xiao Guang say to best show his trust in Brother Hu?

dialog.content: : Is that right?
: Yes, really, you don't need to trouble yourself.
: No worries, if you have any difficulties in the future, just let your buddy know, I can help you.
: Okay, thanks Brother Hu!
: No problem, see you around.
: Alright, I'm heading off then, Brother Hu.

Xiao Guang went to the police station and told the officers in detail about his experiences. The police also discovered that Brother Yang had bullied many students and once accidentally killed someone, burying the body in the woods behind the school. Ultimately, the gang of three led by Brother Yang was dealt with according to the law, and Xiao Guang got the justice he deserved.
No problem, I'll call someone right away.
(very excited and bows to Brother Hu) Great, thank you Brother Hu, thank you Brother Hu.
It's nothing, it's nothing.
I'll head off now.
Alright, alright, don't worry. I'll bring my guys tomorrow to teach them a lesson.
(runs into Brother Yang and his group in the school hallway the next morning and is cornered) Don't touch me, I'll walk by myself.
(continues holding onto Xiao Guang) You think you can just walk away, huh?
(having been lying in wait at the school, hears Xiao Guang being bullied and quickly confronts Brother Yang) So it was you bullying my brother.
(tries to stop Brother Hu) What are you going to do?
Get lost!
What do you want?
Not satisfied, huh? Xiao Guang, come here and hit him! I've got your back, don't be afraid.
(emboldened by Brother Hu's support, hits Brother Yang) Wow, hitting someone feels awesome.
Had enough, or do you want to keep going?
(continues hitting Brother Yang with more force) I'll keep hitting!
In the days that followed, Xiao Guang and Wang Hu grew closer, constantly bullying weaker classmates, and eventually were arrested in adulthood for their numerous wrongdoings.

profile.name: Old Guang
profile.public profile: He is Little Guang’s father, a law-abiding employee.
profile.goal: He hopes for a happy family and Little Guang’s healthy growth.

dialog.content: (Seeing Little Guang come back) Little Guang, you're back?
(Seeing Little Guang come back) Little Guang, you're back?
Yeah, I just walked back.
(Noticing the marks on Little Guang, feeling something's not right) Why are you so dirty? What happened?

content.content: (Although filled with anxiety and fear, decides to tell the truth after calming down) I was bullied by Brother Yang and Sister Yang at school, and they even took my money.
Haha, Dad, don't worry. These little injuries are nothing to me. Thanks for your concern, Dad!
Dad, thank you for your concern. Growing up, you've really helped me with so many problems. You're truly the best dad in the world!
Oh, don't worry about me. I've grown up, maybe just accidentally bumped into something. Nothing serious! It's great to have your care!

question: #question# How should Little Guang respond to leverage Dad's care and help to solve his problems?

content.content: It's nothing, I accidentally fell in the restroom and got some dirt on me. Thanks for noticing, Dad. It makes me feel like someone cares.

Oh, this happened when I was playing basketball with my classmates at school today. I accidentally got hit by the ball and rolled on the ground a few times, so I got a bit dirty. But it’s alright, just a small injury, it doesn't hurt anymore. Dad, you always worry about these little things!
Oh, Dad, I accidentally fell into a mud pit while playing outside today. But I met a kind person who helped clean most of it off my clothes. Dad, you’re making a big deal out of it, haha.

Actually, when I was helping with chores at home today, I accidentally knocked over that bottle of black paint you bought last time, Dad. It splashed all over me. I was going to clean it up quietly, but you still noticed, Dad, you're so observant.

question: #question# How should Little Guang respond to show he understands Dad's feelings?

dialog.content: Who dares to bully my precious son? Let's go, we'll go to your school and talk to your homeroom teacher!

profile.name: Teacher Guan
profile.public profile: The homeroom teacher of Xiaoguang's class in middle school, a dutiful and conscientious worker.
profile.goal: Hopes to diligently fulfill his duties at work and lead a simple, happy life.

dialog.content: Okay... Dad, let's go together.
(Bringing Xiaoguang to Teacher Guan's office, sees Teacher Guan sitting at the desk) Teacher Guan, I'd like to ask what's going on? It seems our child was beaten by Yang Ge from your school.
Xiaoguang's dad, don't worry. Let's do this, I'll call those parents to get some clarity. Please have a seat here for a while.
(Pulling Xiaoguang over) Alright, Xiaoguang, sit here.
(Pulled into the office by Teacher Guan to apologize to Xiaoguang but harbors even more resentment towards Xiaoguang) Xiaoguang, I'm sorry.
(Seeing Xiaoguang return home with a worried face that same evening) Xiaoguang, why do I feel you're still unhappy?
(Hesitating) Actually, I've been bullied by Brother Yang and Sister Yang at school for a long time. I just couldn't take it anymore, that's why I told you.
I see, well then, I'll think of another solution. You go study first.
(Next morning) Dad, I'm off to school.
Xiaoguang, you don't need to go to school today. I found a new job in a big city, and you'll come with us to continue your studies. We're moving right away.
Alright, I'll do as you say, Dad.
A week later, Xiaoguang and his family moved to a new city, marking the start of a new life.
Alright then, be more careful next time. Go take a shower.

profile.name: Ah Xiang
profile.public profile: She is Little Guang's mother, plays the role of a strict mother at home, and is a conscientious and law-abiding worker.
profile.goal: Hopes for family happiness and Little Guang's healthy growth.

dialog.content: (Sees mom approaching) Mom.
(Upon seeing Little Guang all dirty, can't resist slapping him) You little rascal, what have you turned yourself into after just one day at school? I'm sick of washing your clothes every day!
(Very angry upon seeing the child being hit, scolds Little Guang's mom) Why are you so furious? Have you lost money playing mahjong outside again? Can you live with it or not, just get out!
I’ll be out then!

content.content: Mom and Dad, please stop arguing. You've both had a hard day at work, it's not easy for you either. It was my fault for getting the clothes dirty this time. I'll be more careful next time. I'll go take a shower now.
Hey, stop fighting, it's really just trivial stuff! I should just tell you the truth, I was bullied at school and I'm really upset.
Dad, you're right, Mom can be too much sometimes! But Dad, you have to understand, it's not easy for Mom either...
(Looks at Dad, then at Mom, finally lowers his head) Mom and Dad, I know it’s not easy for you either, but I feel so tired every day that I often wonder what the point of living is.

question: #question#What should Little Guang say to show he understands his parents' feelings?

content.content: (After thinking, decides to tell the truth to parents) Here’s what happened, Mom and Dad: I was bullied at school by Brother Yang and Sister Yang, and they took my money. I trust you and believe that after telling you, you can help me.

Mom and Dad, I trust in your love for me, and your arguments are just different perspectives for my good. But I’ve grown up now, and this time I also want to trust in my own ability, believing I can handle my own issues.
Mom and Dad, do you think I've been slacking off on my studies lately, so you're taking this opportunity to teach me a 'life lesson'? Please trust me more!
Oh, Mom and Dad, stop arguing! I’m already tired enough from studying every day, I really don't want to listen to your disputes anymore. I believe you can get along harmoniously!

question: #question#What should Little Guang do to show his trust in his parents?

dialog.content: It's fine, you go wash up first!
(After school the next day, Little Guang is dragged into the bathroom by Brother Yang and his group to get beaten up) Don't hit me, don't hit me! I brought money today!
Money? How much do you have, kid?
I'm giving you all my money today.
(Rummages through Little Guang’s bag and takes out the money) Wow, you brought quite a bit! Smart move!
Brother Yang, I'll give you the money, but can you promise to protect me if anyone bullies me in the future?
(Pretending to agree verbally while actually planning to exploit Little Guang for more money) Just do what you’re supposed to do, and we'll take care of the rest.
(Naively believing it) Okay, thank you, Brother Yang.

Afterwards, Little Guang often sneaks money to Brother Yang to avoid getting bullied. He spends every day trying to save money, whether it’s asking his dad for more or stealing the money his mom wins from playing mahjong. When those options fail, he resorts to collecting bottles to sell. This shadowy life goes on with no hope of change.
Oh my, such a thing happened. I'll contact your class teacher right away and report it.
I'm sorry, Little Guang. Mom wrongly accused you.
It's okay, Mom and Dad, I know you mean well for me.
How about we move to a different place?
But I lost some money playing mahjong recently, I'm afraid we're a bit tight on cash.
(First scolds A Xiang and then comforts Little Guang) You really must be kidding me! This is harming the child. Little Guang, Dad will earn more money soon, and once we have enough, we'll move!
(The next morning) Dad, I'm off to school.
(Picks up a small knife and slips it into Little Guang's bag) Little Guang, only take this out when you absolutely must!
What do you mean by 'absolutely must', Dad?
I mean when your life is in danger.
(The next afternoon, intercepts Little Guang at the bottom of the school building) You still dare to come to school!
What are you guys up to? Let go of me!
(Drags Little Guang to the small forest behind the campus, and with others, plans to bury Little Guang alive) Behave, you! Dare to tattle, I'll finish you today and bury you here.

content.content: (Takes out the small knife he's carrying and then hides it, muttering to himself) I better sneak away quietly.
Brother Yang, do you think you can scare me like this? This knife in my hand is no joke. If you really dare to make a move, I won't just sit here and wait! Don't force me to unleash the demon within!

Ha, you think the numbers are in your favor and you can bully me? Let me tell you, my dad is with the police, if you dare to touch a hair on my head, he won't let you go! I've been holding back just to give you a chance!
(Scared to death) Brother Yang, I know I was wrong, I promise to listen to you from now on and not to upset you. Can you let me go this time? I swear I'll follow your lead from now on.

question: #question#How should Little Guang respond to Brother Yang to show he's consciously controlling his impulses?

content.content: There's many of you, and I can't escape. Since you pushed me this far, I can only fight it out with you today!
Brother Yang, let me say something. We've all been classmates, there's no need to make things so tense. The future is long ahead of us.
Alright, Brother Yang, since you've made up your minds, I won't offer futile resistance. Just don't make it too painful, that's my last request.
Brother Yang, what you're doing is illegal now, and the consequences would be unimaginable if discovered. Think it through!

question: #question#How should Little Guang respond to Brother Yang to show he's making a sensible decision in this situation?

content.content: (Waits quietly for the right moment while they are digging a hole, planning to achieve his goal within the effective time, and whispers to the knife) I need to act when they're not paying attention. This time, I'll have my revenge!
Brother Yang, I know I was wrong, I really don't dare to tattle anymore. Can you guys just hear me out? I'm just a minor character, not worth all this commotion.
(Thinks carefully about how to survive) Brother Yang, I have an idea, maybe we can make money together, it's quicker than doing this. If we work together, we won't have to worry about money anymore.

(Eyes darting around, suddenly has an idea and collapses) Brother Yang, I'm suddenly feeling really dizzy, maybe it's a heatstroke. Can you let me rest for a moment? I have some medicine in my bag, it'll help.

question: #question#Given the current complex situation, how can Little Guang find a way to survive?

dialog.content: (seeing Xiao Guang trying to leave, hurriedly shouts) Brother Yang, he seems to be trying to escape!
Oh no! This is bad, hurry and chase her!
I'm going after him! I'm going after him!
(catches up to Xiao Guang and kicks him to the ground) You still think you can run?
(already very weak) What you're doing is criminal!
(continues to violently beat Xiao Guang) I’m just a minor, even if I kill you, it’s no big deal, let alone a crime!
Xiao Guang didn't manage to escape and was unfortunately killed; cowardice ultimately turned against himself.
(Directly pins Xiaoguang to the ground) You actually dared to come at us with a knife!
Yang Ge, I think he's not breathing!
Damn it, it's not like we haven't killed anyone before. Keep hitting him!
Xiaoguang, in a reckless fight against multiple opponents led by Yang Ge, was ultimately defeated and unfortunately killed.
Brother Yang, the pit has been dug.
Quick, bring over Xiaoguang.
(pretending to sit obediently, but actually waiting for the right moment to draw the knife) Ah, don't come any closer!
(stabbed by Xiaoguang) Ugh!
(seeing Brother Yang getting stabbed, she flees quickly) Oh my God!

content.content: (after seeing Brother Yang dead, calmly decides to turn himself in) Sigh, even though I've avenged myself, I can't get past the ethics and morality. Killing someone means I have to face the consequences. I should go to the police and turn myself in.
Hmph, Brother Yang finally got what he deserved! I still remember all the times he bullied me. This time, I got my revenge. I can finally move on with my life!
Oh no, this is troublesome! Brother Yang is dead, and I'm definitely the prime suspect. I need to find a scapegoat quickly and pin this on someone else so I can shake off the suspicion.
Sigh. I killed Brother Yang. But I had no choice! He always bullied me before. This time I was just defending myself.

question: #question# In the face of Brother Yang’s death, what should Xiaoguang do to show that he adheres to the correct moral standards?

content.content: (after seeing Brother Yang dead, plans to meticulously handle the scene, burying Brother Yang and cleaning up the tools and the site) By doing this, hopefully, no one will find out!
Oh my God, how did Brother Yang die? This has nothing to do with me! I need to leave here immediately, so the police don’t mistakenly think I’m the killer.
Oh no, this is a mess! I need to find a scapegoat and pin this on someone else. As long as I'm smart about it, the police won't find me.
Hmph, so what if Brother Yang is dead? He bullied me a lot before. I'm going to report to the police, telling them he struck first, and I accidentally killed him in self-defense.

question: #question# In the face of Brother Yang’s death, what should Xiaoguang do to distance himself and evade investigation?

dialog.content: (Seeing Xiaoguang with blood on his hands, stumbling back to school) Oh my god, what's happened to Xiaoguang!
Teacher Guan... I killed Brother Yang.
How could you act so impulsively and do such a thing!
I'm sorry, Teacher Guan. Please help me call the police.

After the police were called, they confirmed the murder case and also discovered that Brother Yang had beaten many students. At one time, he accidentally killed someone and buried them in the woods behind the school. Xiaoguang's testimony was verified, and his actions were deemed to be in self-defense, leading to his immediate release without charges.
(After some time, brought Xiaoguang into the office) Xiaoguang, following an investigation, you're suspected in the murder case of Brother Yang.
(Nervous but aware this day would come) I'm sorry, Teacher Guan, it was me.
I really can't believe you would do such a thing. The police will be here shortly, so prepare yourself.
(Standing in despair) Alright, I understand, teacher.

Sister Yang couldn't handle the pressure and eventually reported to the police. Following the report, the police confirmed the murder case and discovered that Brother Yang had previously assaulted many students. In one incident, he accidentally killed someone and buried them in the woods behind the school. Although Xiaoguang was judged to be acting in self-defense, due to misguided thinking, he has to serve a year in a juvenile detention center.
Alright, how much?
I still have 15 bucks in my pocket, just take it all.
(still beating Xiao Guang) What? Just this little? You're quite the spender!
Please don't worry, I'll give you money every day from now on, just don't hit me anymore!
You promised, alright then, I'll let you go for today.
Okay, thanks for your generosity, Yang Ge.

Xiao Guang silently endures Yang Ge's bullying. He gets beaten if he doesn't pay up on time and doesn't dare tell anyone. Eventually, he suffers from depression and is unable to attend school, leading him to seek treatment at a rehabilitation center.
